## Runtime.IReadOnlyResultResourceTree.getBranchById() method

Gets a branch node by its full ResourceId path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBranchById(id: ResourceId): Result<IReadOnlyResourceTreeBranch<T>>;
```
